scenes.action_text:
Buffy, the Vampire Slayer <b> 
                                Buffy, the Vampire Slayer by Joss Whedon              FADE IN:               EXT. MEDIEVAL VILLAGE - JUST BEFORE SUNSET  We see an Italian village at the height of the plague.  Funeral processions, decrepit houses with their windows boarded up... the stench of death all around.              TITLE:  EUROPE. THE DARK AGES  Thro
